content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":260272,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔血魂から声が聞こえる","translatedEnglishLine":"A voice can be heard from the Magic Blood Soul."},{"lineNumber":260273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　破壊せよ、破壊せよ、殺せ、虐殺、陵辱、苦しめよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Destroy, destroy, kill, massacre, violate, torment."},{"lineNumber":260274,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メインプレイヤーに平穏を与えるな、常に滅亡の恐怖を与えよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Do not grant peace to the main player; always instill the fear of annihilation."},{"lineNumber":260275,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界を混沌に貶めよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Bring the world down into chaos."},{"lineNumber":260276,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全ては創造神の為、創造神の娯楽の為","translatedEnglishLine":"All is for the Creator God, for the Creator God's amusement."},{"lineNumber":260277,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（それっぽいイメージで流れる声、これは魔王に登録されて命令）","translatedEnglishLine":"(A voice flows with an appropriate image; this is registered to the Demon King as an order.)"},{"lineNumber":260278,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔血魂が兵系すると魔王ランス（真っ赤、血の塊）になる、えっ・・俺とあわてるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"When the Magic Blood Soul forms troops, it becomes Demon King Rance (bright red, a blood mass) — Eh… Rance panics at this."},{"lineNumber":260279,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔血魂の記憶がこの形を作っているだけと誰かが説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone explains that the memory of the Magic Blood Soul is merely forming this shape."},{"lineNumber":260280,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":260281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260282,"originalJapaneseLine":"以降　順に","translatedEnglishLine":"From here on, in order,"},{"lineNumber":260283,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王ランス血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Rance Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王リトルプリンセス血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Little Princess Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王ガイ血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Guy Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王ジル血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Jill Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260287,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王ナイチサ血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Naitisa Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260288,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王スラル血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Slal Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王アベル血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Abel Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・（戦闘　魔王ククルククル血）","translatedEnglishLine":" - (Battle: Demon King Kukurukukuru Blood)"},{"lineNumber":260291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス＞美樹＞ガイ＞ジル　とどんどん過去に遡っていく　最期はククルククル","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance > Miki > Guy > Jill — going further and further back into the past, ending with Kukurukukuru."},{"lineNumber":260292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　間に会話イベントを入れるかどうかは未定","translatedEnglishLine":"It is undecided whether to insert conversation events in between."},{"lineNumber":260293,"originalJapaneseLine":"最期に血は、大きな魔血魂となる。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the end, the blood becomes a large Magic Blood Soul."},{"lineNumber":260294,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがそれをたたき切ると霧のように消滅した","translatedEnglishLine":"When Rance strikes it down, it vanishes like mist."},{"lineNumber":260295,"originalJapaneseLine":"終わったの・・とエールがランスに聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it over...?\" Yell asks Rance."},{"lineNumber":260296,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、俺達の勝利だ。とエールの頭を撫でる","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it's our victory.\" He pats Yell's head."},{"lineNumber":260297,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールが一人ずつ仲間を見つめる","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell looks at each of the comrades one by one."},{"lineNumber":260298,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな戦い終わってへたり込んでいたりするが、達成感で笑顔","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is slumped down after the battle, but they smile with a sense of accomplishment."},{"lineNumber":260299,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ヒロインのみは特別なシーンとしていれる）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Only heroines are included as special scenes.)"},{"lineNumber":260300,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールも達成感を満喫しているシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"A scene where Yell is also enjoying the sense of accomplishment."},{"lineNumber":260301,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、疲れた・・もう２．３日は動けないよ・・たはー","translatedEnglishLine":"But I'm tired... I probably can't move for two or three days... haha."},{"lineNumber":260302,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260303,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ＣＧ：立ち去るランス）","translatedEnglishLine":"(CG: Rance departing)"},{"lineNumber":260304,"originalJapaneseLine":"とランスを見ると","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching Rance,"},{"lineNumber":260305,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな中、ランスはクエルプランを抱きかかえて夕日の中へ消えていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Rance carries Quelplan in his arms and disappears into the sunset."},{"lineNumber":260306,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルも待って下さいーとついていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiiru also says, 'Wait for me—' and follows him."},{"lineNumber":260307,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、人間に戻った記念だ、今夜は寝かさないぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, this is a commemoration of returning to being human; I won't let you sleep tonight."},{"lineNumber":260308,"originalJapaneseLine":"タフだな・・・すごいや。","translatedEnglishLine":"You're tough... impressive."},{"lineNumber":260309,"originalJapaneseLine":"帰り道スタート","translatedEnglishLine":"Return journey start."},{"lineNumber":260310,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件　ダークランスが大親友で無い時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Dark Rance is not your best friend."},{"lineNumber":260311,"originalJapaneseLine":"それじゃ、俺はこれでと離れます、兄弟達、また会おう","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, I'll be leaving now. Brothers, see you again."},{"lineNumber":260312,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、じゃ俺達も帰るかと帰宅が始まります","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, 'Well, shall we head home too?' and the return begins."},{"lineNumber":260313,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件　レリコフかヒーローが大親友で無い時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Rerikof or Hero is not your best friend."},{"lineNumber":260314,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at Helman."},{"lineNumber":260315,"originalJapaneseLine":"レリコフ、ヒーローと別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Part ways with Rerikof and Hero."},{"lineNumber":260316,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件　ザンスかウズメが大親友で無い時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Zans or Uzume is not your best friend."},{"lineNumber":260317,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at Lezas."},{"lineNumber":260318,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンス、ウズメと別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Part ways with Zans and Uzume."},{"lineNumber":260319,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件　乱義、深根、元就が大親友で無い時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Rangy, Fukane, and Motonari are not your best friends."},{"lineNumber":260320,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮ到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":260321,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義、深根、元就と別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Part ways with Rangy, Fukane, and Motonari."},{"lineNumber":260322,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件　スシヌ、ミックスが大親友で無い時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Sushinu and Mix are not your best friends."},{"lineNumber":260323,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at Zes."},{"lineNumber":260324,"originalJapaneseLine":"スシヌ、ミックスと別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Part ways with Sushinu and Mix."},{"lineNumber":260325,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件　リセット、志津香が大親友で無い時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Reset and Shizuka are not your best friends."},{"lineNumber":260326,"originalJapaneseLine":"シャングリラに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at Shangri-La."},{"lineNumber":260327,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセット、志津香、ナギと別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Part ways with Reset, Shizuka, and Nagi."},{"lineNumber":260328,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件　長田、ドッスワッスが大親友で無い時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Nagata and Dossuwassu are not your best friends."},{"lineNumber":260329,"originalJapaneseLine":"家の近くの街道","translatedEnglishLine":"The road near home."},{"lineNumber":260330,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田、ドッス、ワッスと別れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Part ways with Nagata, Doss, and Wass."},{"lineNumber":260331,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t実家に帰る","translatedEnglishLine":"Return to the family home."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂から声が聞こえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A voice can be heard from the Magic Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊せよ、破壊せよ、殺せ、虐殺、陵辱、苦しめよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Destroy, destroy, kill, massacre, violate, torment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メインプレイヤーに平穏を与えるな、常に滅亡の恐怖を与えよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do not grant peace to the main player; always instill the fear of annihilation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を混沌に貶めよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bring the world down into chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ては創造神の為、創造神の娯楽の為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All is for the Creator God, for the Creator God's amusement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （それっぽいイメージで流れる声、これは魔王に登録されて命令）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (A voice flows with an appropriate image; this is registered to the Demon King as an order.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂が兵系すると魔王ランス（真っ赤、血の塊）になる、えっ・・俺とあわてるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the Magic Blood Soul forms troops, it becomes Demon King Rance (bright red, a blood mass) — Eh… Rance panics at this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂の記憶がこの形を作っているだけと誰かが説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains that the memory of the Magic Blood Soul is merely forming this shape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以降　順に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here on, in order,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ランス血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Rance Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王リトルプリンセス血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Little Princess Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ガイ血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Guy Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ジル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Jill Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ナイチサ血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Naitisa Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王スラル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Slal Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王アベル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Abel Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ククルククル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Kukurukukuru Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス＞美樹＞ガイ＞ジル　とどんどん過去に遡っていく　最期はククルククル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance > Miki > Guy > Jill — going further and further back into the past, ending with Kukurukukuru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に会話イベントを入れるかどうかは未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is undecided whether to insert conversation events in between.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期に血は、大きな魔血魂となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the end, the blood becomes a large Magic Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがそれをたたき切ると霧のように消滅した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance strikes it down, it vanishes like mist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 終わったの・・とエールがランスに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it over...?" Yell asks Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、俺達の勝利だ。とエールの頭を撫でる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, it's our victory." He pats Yell's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが一人ずつ仲間を見つめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell looks at each of the comrades one by one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな戦い終わってへたり込んでいたりするが、達成感で笑顔
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is slumped down after the battle, but they smile with a sense of accomplishment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ヒロインのみは特別なシーンとしていれる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Only heroines are included as special scenes.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールも達成感を満喫しているシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene where Yell is also enjoying the sense of accomplishment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、疲れた・・もう２．３日は動けないよ・・たはー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I'm tired... I probably can't move for two or three days... haha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：立ち去るランス）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Rance departing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスを見ると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中、ランスはクエルプランを抱きかかえて夕日の中へ消えていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Rance carries Quelplan in his arms and disappears into the sunset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルも待って下さいーとついていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiiru also says, 'Wait for me—' and follows him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、人間に戻った記念だ、今夜は寝かさないぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, this is a commemoration of returning to being human; I won't let you sleep tonight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タフだな・・・すごいや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're tough... impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰り道スタート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return journey start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　ダークランスが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Dark Rance is not your best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃ、俺はこれでと離れます、兄弟達、また会おう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, I'll be leaving now. Brothers, see you again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、じゃ俺達も帰るかと帰宅が始まります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, 'Well, shall we head home too?' and the return begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　レリコフかヒーローが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Rerikof or Hero is not your best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフ、ヒーローと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Rerikof and Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　ザンスかウズメが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Zans or Uzume is not your best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Lezas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、ウズメと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Zans and Uzume.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　乱義、深根、元就が大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Rangy, Fukane, and Motonari are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義、深根、元就と別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Rangy, Fukane, and Motonari.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　スシヌ、ミックスが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Sushinu and Mix are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Zes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌ、ミックスと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Sushinu and Mix.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　リセット、志津香が大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Reset and Shizuka are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、志津香、ナギと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Reset, Shizuka, and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　長田、ドッスワッスが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Nagata and Dossuwassu are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家の近くの街道
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The road near home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田、ドッス、ワッスと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Nagata, Doss, and Wass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実家に帰る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to the family home.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂から声が聞こえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A voice can be heard from the Magic Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破壊せよ、破壊せよ、殺せ、虐殺、陵辱、苦しめよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Destroy, destroy, kill, massacre, violate, torment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メインプレイヤーに平穏を与えるな、常に滅亡の恐怖を与えよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do not grant peace to the main player; always instill the fear of annihilation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を混沌に貶めよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bring the world down into chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ては創造神の為、創造神の娯楽の為
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All is for the Creator God, for the Creator God's amusement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （それっぽいイメージで流れる声、これは魔王に登録されて命令）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (A voice flows with an appropriate image; this is registered to the Demon King as an order.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂が兵系すると魔王ランス（真っ赤、血の塊）になる、えっ・・俺とあわてるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the Magic Blood Soul forms troops, it becomes Demon King Rance (bright red, a blood mass) — Eh… Rance panics at this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂の記憶がこの形を作っているだけと誰かが説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains that the memory of the Magic Blood Soul is merely forming this shape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以降　順に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here on, in order,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ランス血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Rance Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王リトルプリンセス血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Little Princess Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ガイ血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Guy Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ジル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Jill Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ナイチサ血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Naitisa Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王スラル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Slal Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王アベル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Abel Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・（戦闘　魔王ククルククル血）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - (Battle: Demon King Kukurukukuru Blood)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス＞美樹＞ガイ＞ジル　とどんどん過去に遡っていく　最期はククルククル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance > Miki > Guy > Jill — going further and further back into the past, ending with Kukurukukuru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に会話イベントを入れるかどうかは未定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is undecided whether to insert conversation events in between.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期に血は、大きな魔血魂となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the end, the blood becomes a large Magic Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがそれをたたき切ると霧のように消滅した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance strikes it down, it vanishes like mist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 終わったの・・とエールがランスに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it over...?" Yell asks Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、俺達の勝利だ。とエールの頭を撫でる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, it's our victory." He pats Yell's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが一人ずつ仲間を見つめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell looks at each of the comrades one by one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな戦い終わってへたり込んでいたりするが、達成感で笑顔
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is slumped down after the battle, but they smile with a sense of accomplishment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ヒロインのみは特別なシーンとしていれる）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Only heroines are included as special scenes.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールも達成感を満喫しているシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene where Yell is also enjoying the sense of accomplishment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、疲れた・・もう２．３日は動けないよ・・たはー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I'm tired... I probably can't move for two or three days... haha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：立ち去るランス）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Rance departing)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスを見ると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中、ランスはクエルプランを抱きかかえて夕日の中へ消えていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Rance carries Quelplan in his arms and disappears into the sunset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルも待って下さいーとついていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiiru also says, 'Wait for me—' and follows him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、人間に戻った記念だ、今夜は寝かさないぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, this is a commemoration of returning to being human; I won't let you sleep tonight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タフだな・・・すごいや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're tough... impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰り道スタート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return journey start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　ダークランスが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Dark Rance is not your best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃ、俺はこれでと離れます、兄弟達、また会おう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, I'll be leaving now. Brothers, see you again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、じゃ俺達も帰るかと帰宅が始まります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, 'Well, shall we head home too?' and the return begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　レリコフかヒーローが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Rerikof or Hero is not your best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフ、ヒーローと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Rerikof and Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　ザンスかウズメが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Zans or Uzume is not your best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Lezas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、ウズメと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Zans and Uzume.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　乱義、深根、元就が大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Rangy, Fukane, and Motonari are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義、深根、元就と別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Rangy, Fukane, and Motonari.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　スシヌ、ミックスが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Sushinu and Mix are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Zes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌ、ミックスと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Sushinu and Mix.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　リセット、志津香が大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Reset and Shizuka are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、志津香、ナギと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Reset, Shizuka, and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件　長田、ドッスワッスが大親友で無い時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Nagata and Dossuwassu are not your best friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家の近くの街道
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The road near home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田、ドッス、ワッスと別れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Part ways with Nagata, Doss, and Wass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実家に帰る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to the family home.
